climbs.name: Say No to Jugs
climbs.fa: Don Wilson, Jack Marshall & Mike Simmons, March 1991

content.description: Short and to the point - you'll get four bolts worth of slightly overhanging goodness with positive holds and generous protection on this enjoyable climb. Two stars out of five.
content.location:
Located on the north side of the corridor, across from

Cling or Fling

and almost directly under a huge chockstone.

content.description:
Located 10' left of

Cling or Fling

on the south side of the corridor.

Thin edges up a featured face, similar to Cling Or Fling, gain the same ledge as that route. One star out of five.

climbs.name: Lost Boys
climbs.fa: Bruce Smith, Eric Jackson & Bart Fay, April 1990

content.description:
Interesting climbing up a vertical face past three bolts (crux) leads slightly left into the crack of

Czech Cows Say Boo

to finish. Descend by walking off the back by heading north and then west down a jumble of boulders. One, maybe two stars out of five.
content.location:
Located on the north side of the corridor, almost directly across from

Cling or Fling

.

content.description: An aesthetic smooth slab with two tiers (two bolts on each)
content.protection: 4 bolts to a bolted anchor with rap rings
content.location:
This is NOT in the cling or fling corridor, but on the North end of the formation (for reference cling or fling corridor has walls on the north and south with the parking being to the east)

If in the corridor, exit on the west then walk around. If approaching from the parking lot, don't pass into the corrridor, just stay right and save yourself the headache of boulder hopping (except for those at the very end to get to the route)

climbs.name: Green Mansions
climbs.fa: Herb Laeger, Eve Laeger & Bob Kamps, September 1987

content.description:
Located just right of

Cling or Fling

near the western mouth of the corridor.

Climbs a short but nice handcrack to shared anchors with Cling Or Fling on the ledge above. One star out of five.

Short crack on the corridor right side at its entrance (the next crack to the right of Green Mansions).  Start atop the entrance big boulder.  Its middle stretch becomes a grainy thin seam that offers only limited critical pro.  Heady for its easy grade.
content.location: Walk across top to climber's left and use the rap slings atop Green Mansions.

climbs.name: Czech Cows Say Boo
climbs.fa: Radim Bedin, Todd Gordon & Mary Hirschfeld, August 1991

content.description: Start off a block, clip a bolt, and then make some thin moves into a vertical crack system. Descend by walking off the back by heading north and then west down a jumble of boulders. One star out of five.
content.location:
Located on the north side of the corridor, just left of

Lost Boys

and very near the western entrance to the corridor. For reference, the route

Beautiful Screamer

lies just around and left from this route.

climbs.name: Cling or Fling
climbs.fa: Herb Laeger, Eve Laeger & Bob Kamps, September 1987

content.description:
This climbs the attractive face on the south side of the corridor and lies more or less across from the route

Lost Boys

(5.10d).

Thin crimping up crisp edges is what you'll encounter on this enjoyable, but all too short route, that's reminscent of the

Oyster Bar

routes. Two stars out of five.

climbs.name: Bush Doctor
climbs.fa: Chris Miller and Jim Hammerle, January 1993

content.description: Unprotected but easy climbing up large, positive holds gains a horizontal crack where a short move to the left reaches a vertical crack with a bush.
content.location:
Across from

Beautiful Screamer

and about 60 feet to the north on an east-facing wall.

content.description:
Start same as

Beautiful Dreamer

~15ft. up then traverse left.  Clip a bolt and follow a left leaning thin seam until it peters out.  Power through a slight bulge out of the seam and crimp your way to the anchors.  Rock quality on the traverse is suspect.  Pull gently.  The 3 fixed pins described in Bartlett's Pinto Basin book are no longer there.
This is a fairly sustained hand crack in a shady location.  It is on the southwest end of Cling Or Fling Corridor.  This route is not in the 1992 Vogel guide.
